lyric:
[by:Trap_Girl]
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Ava Max/Andreas Andersen Haukeland/Henry Walter/Madison Love/Will Lobban-Bean
[00:00.337] 作词 : Ava Max/Andreas Andersen Haukeland/Henry Walter/Madison Love/Will Lobban-Bean
[00:01.11]Oh, she's sweet but a psycho
[00:04.37]A little bit psycho
[00:06.27]At night she screamin'
[00:07.40]"I'm-ma-ma-ma out ma mind"
[00:09.29]Oh, she's hot but a psycho
[00:11.65]So left but she's right though
[00:13.52]At night she screamin'
[00:14.69]"I'm-ma-ma-ma out ma mind"
[00:16.53]She'll make you curse, but she a blessing
[00:20.57]She'll rip your shirt within a second
[00:24.01]You'll be coming back, back for seconds
[00:27.57]With your plate, you just can't help it
[00:31.00]No, no, you'll play along
[00:35.72]Let her lead you on, on, on
[00:37.27]You'll be saying, "No, no"
[00:40.95]Then saying, "Yes, yes, yes
[00:42.67]'Cause she messin' with your head
